verses.verse: אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> He תּ֭וֹכָחוֹת <WH8433> that being often reproved מַקְשֶׁה־ <WH7185> hardeneth עֹ֑רֶף <WH6203> [his] neck פֶּ֥תַע <WH6621> shall suddenly יִ֝שָּׁבֵ֗ר <WH7665> be destroyed וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> beyond מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <WH4832> and that without remedy

בִּרְב֣וֹת <WH7235> are in authority צַ֭דִּיקִים <WH6662> When the righteous יִשְׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> rejoice הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> the people וּבִמְשֹׁ֥ל <WH4910> beareth rule רָ֝שָׁ֗ע <WH7563> but when the wicked יֵאָ֥נַֽח <WH584> mourn עָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people

אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> Whoso אֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> loveth חָ֭כְמָה <WH2451> wisdom יְשַׂמַּ֣ח <WH8055> rejoiceth אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father וְרֹעֶ֥ה <WH7462> but he that keepeth company ז֝וֹנ֗וֹת <WH2181> with harlots יְאַבֶּד־ <WH6> spendeth הֽוֹן׃ <WH1952> [his] substance

מֶ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> The king בְּ֭מִשְׁפָּט <WH4941> by judgment יַעֲמִ֣יד <WH5975> establisheth אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> but he תְּרוּמ֣וֹת <WH8641> that receiveth gifts יֶֽהֶרְסֶֽנָּה׃ <WH2040> overthroweth

גֶּ֭בֶר <WH1397> A man מַחֲלִ֣יק <WH2505> that flattereth עַל־ <WH5921> and רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour רֶ֝֗שֶׁת <WH7568> a net פּוֹרֵ֥שׂ <WH6566> spreadeth עַל־ <WH5921> for פְּעָמָֽיו׃ <WH6471> for his feet

בְּפֶ֤שַֽׁע <WH6588> In the transgression אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man רָ֣ע <WH7451> of an evil מוֹקֵ֑שׁ <WH4170> [there is] a snare וְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <WH6662> but the righteous יָר֥וּן <WH7442> doth sing וְשָׂמֵֽחַ׃ <WH8055> and rejoices

יֹדֵ֣עַ <WH3045> considereth צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> The righteous דִּ֣ין <WH1779> the cause דַּלִּ֑ים <WH1800> of the poor רָ֝שָׁ֗ע <WH7563> [but] the wicked לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יָבִ֥ין <WH995> regardeth דָּֽעַת׃ <WH1847> not to know
אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> he לָ֭צוֹן <WH3944> Scornful יָפִ֣יחוּ <WH6315> into a snare קִרְיָ֑ה <WH7151> a city וַ֝חֲכָמִ֗ים <WH2450> but wise יָשִׁ֥יבוּ <WH7725> [men] turn away אָֽף׃ <WH639> wrath

אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> man חָכָ֗ם <WH2450> [If] a wise נִ֭שְׁפָּט <WH8199> contendeth אֶת־ <WH854> for אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אֱוִ֑יל <WH191> with a foolish וְרָגַ֥ז <WH7264> whether he rage וְ֝שָׂחַ֗ק <WH7832> or laugh וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and there נָֽחַת׃ <WH5183> [there is] no rest
אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> another דָ֭מִים <WH1818> of bloodshed יִשְׂנְאוּ־ <WH8130> hate תָ֑ם <WH8535> the upright וִֽ֝ישָׁרִ֗ים <WH3477> but the just יְבַקְשׁ֥וּ <WH1245> seek נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> his soul

כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner ר֭וּחוֹ <WH7307> all his mind יוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> uttereth כְסִ֑יל <WH3684> A fool וְ֝חָכָ֗ם <WH2450> but a wise בְּאָח֥וֹר <WH268> it in till afterwards יְשַׁבְּחֶֽנָּה׃ <WH7623> [man] keepeth

מֹ֭שֵׁל <WH4910> If a ruler מַקְשִׁ֣יב <WH7181> hearken עַל־ <WH5921> and דְּבַר־ <WH1697> act שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> to falsehood כָּֽל־ <WH3605> All מְשָׁרְתָ֥יו <WH8334> all his servants רְשָׁעִֽים׃ <WH7563> [are] wicked

רָ֤שׁ <WH7326> The poor וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man תְּכָכִ֣ים <WH8501> and the deceitful נִפְגָּ֑שׁוּ <WH6298> meet together מֵ֤אִיר־ <WH215> lighteneth עֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> their eyes שְׁנֵיהֶ֣ם <WH8147> both יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> The king שׁוֹפֵ֣ט <WH8199> judgeth בֶּֽאֱמֶ֣ת <WH571> that faithfully דַּלִּ֑ים <WH1800> the poor כִּ֝סְא֗וֹ <WH3678> his throne לָעַ֥ד <WH5703> for ever יִכּֽוֹן׃ <WH3559> shall be established

שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> The rod וְ֭תוֹכַחַת <WH8433> and reproof יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> give חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> wisdom וְנַ֥עַר <WH5288> but a child מְ֝שֻׁלָּ֗ח <WH7971> left מֵבִ֥ישׁ <WH954> to shame אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> [to himself] bringeth his mother

בִּרְב֣וֹת <WH7235> are multiplied רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> When the wicked יִרְבֶּה־ <WH7235> increaseth פָּ֑שַׁע <WH6588> transgression וְ֝צַדִּיקִ֗ים <WH6662> but the righteous בְּֽמַפַּלְתָּ֥ם <WH4658> their fall יִרְאֽוּ׃ <WH7200> shall see

יַסֵּ֣ר <WH3256> Correct בִּ֭נְךָ <WH1121> thy son וִֽינִיחֶ֑ךָ <WH5117> and he shall give thee rest וְיִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> yea he shall give מַעֲדַנִּ֣ים <WH4574> delight לְנַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> unto thy soul פ

בְּאֵ֣ין <WH369> there חָ֭זוֹן <WH2377> Where [there is] no vision יִפָּ֣רַֽע <WH6544> perish עָ֑ם <WH5971> the people וְשֹׁמֵ֖ר <WH8104> but he that keepeth תּוֹרָ֣ה <WH8451> the law אַשְׁרֵֽהוּ׃ <WH835> happy

בִּ֭דְבָרִים <WH1697> by words לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִוָּ֣סֶר <WH3256> will not be corrected עָ֑בֶד <WH5650> A servant כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָ֝בִ֗ין <WH995> for though he understand וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> there מַעֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4617> he will not answer
חָזִ֗יתָ <WH2372> Seest אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> thou a man אָ֣ץ <WH213> [that is] hasty בִּדְבָרָ֑יו <WH1697> act תִּקְוָ֖ה <WH8615> hope לִכְסִ֣יל <WH3684> of a fool מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> than

מְפַנֵּ֣ק <WH6445> He that delicately bringeth up מִנֹּ֣עַר <WH5290> from a child עַבְדּ֑וֹ <WH5650> his servant וְ֝אַחֲרִית֗וֹ <WH319> at the length יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> to be a מָנֽוֹן׃ <WH4497> shall have him become [his] son

אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> man אַ֭ף <WH639> An angry יְגָרֶ֣ה <WH1624> stirreth up מָד֑וֹן <WH4066> strife וּבַ֖עַל <WH1167> man חֵמָ֣ה <WH2534> and a furious רַב־ <WH7227> aboundeth in פָּֽשַׁע׃ <WH6588> transgression

גַּאֲוַ֣ת <WH1346> pride אָ֭דָם <WH120> A man's תַּשְׁפִּילֶ֑נּוּ <WH8213> shall bring him low וּשְׁפַל־ <WH8217> the humble ר֝֗וּחַ <WH7307> in spirit יִתְמֹ֥ךְ <WH8551> shall uphold כָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> but honour

חוֹלֵ֣ק <WH2505> Whoso is partner עִם־ <WH5973> with גַּ֭נָּב <WH1590> with a thief שׂוֹנֵ֣א <WH8130> hateth נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> his own soul אָלָ֥ה <WH423> cursing יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> he heareth וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nothing יַגִּֽיד׃ <WH5046> and bewrayeth

חֶרְדַּ֣ת <WH2731> The fear אָ֭דָם <WH120> of man יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> bringeth מוֹקֵ֑שׁ <WH4170> a snare וּבוֹטֵ֖חַ <WH982> but whoso putteth his trust בַּיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> in the LORD יְשֻׂגָּֽב׃ <WH7682> shall be safe

רַ֭בִּים <WH7227> Many מְבַקְשִׁ֣ים <WH1245> seek פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> favour מוֹשֵׁ֑ל <WH4910> the ruler's וּ֝מֵיְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> [cometh] from the LORD מִשְׁפַּט־ <WH4941> judgment אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> but [every] man's

תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> [is] an abomination צַ֭דִּיקִים <WH6662> to the just אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man עָ֑וֶל <WH5766> An unjust וְתוֹעֲבַ֖ת <WH8441> [is] abomination רָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> to the wicked יְשַׁר־ <WH3477> and [he that is] upright דָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> in the way פ
